1.0.0.name: wordpress/appad-manager
1.0.0.description:
This plugin insert advertise between posts (ads, coupons, job listings...) in AppThemes Premium Themes. In administrative panel You can setup frequency of inserting advertise. Check screenshots to see how it will appear on Your site.

Supported themes

  • AppThemes: ClassiPress, Clipper, JobRoller

Supported languages

  • English
  • Polish

If You translated plugin to Your native language, please send it to me, and will attach it to next release. E-mail address You will find on contact page. Waiting as well for suggestions, where and how to insert new ads.
